sect1.title: {popup_init}
sect1.para: {popup} is an integration of overLib, a library used for popup windows. These are used for context sensitive information, such as help windows or tooltips.

listitem.para: {popup_init} must be called only once, preferably within the <head> tag within any page you plan on using the {popup} function.
The path is relative to the executing script or a fully qualified domain path, ie not the relative to the template.
overLib is written and maintained by Erik Bosrup, and the homepage/download is at &url.overLib;.

example.title: {popup_init}
example.programlisting: {* popup_init must be called once at the top of the page *} {popup_init src='javascripts/overlib/overlib.js'} {* fully qualified url example *} {popup_init src='http://myserver.org/my_js_libs/overlib/overlib.js'} // the first example will output

note.title: XHTML validation
note.para:
The {popup_init} does not validate with strict and you will get the error document type does not allow element "div" here; (ie a <div> tag in the <head>).
This means you will need to include the <script> and <div> tags manually.
